description: Numbers n such that binary expansion does not contain 001.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
prog: (PARI) is(n)=n=binary(n);for(i=4,#n,if(n[i]&&!n[i-1]&&!n[i-2], return(0))); 1 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Mar 29 2013(Haskell)a004745 n = a004745_list !! (n-1)a004745_list = filter f [0..] where   f x  = x < 4 || x `mod` 8 /= 1 && f (x `div` 2)-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 01 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
